at.tugraz.kmi.medokyservice.bl

Class InterventionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.tugraz.kmi.medokyservice.bl.InterventionManager

  • public class InterventionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The class manages the registration and instantiation of classes derived from Intervention. Interventions are broadly classified according to there expected impact into Emotion-, Clarification-, Motivation- and Competence Related - Interventions.
    Author:
    Simone Kopeinik

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InterventionManager()
      Instantiates a new intervention manager.
